column4: What is the way to open a bug against Ubuntu in general, when no specific package is known.... seems to be the base OS.
I'll help you find the package it's in.  What's the problem?
Thanks! Working with two different brands / models of KVM switches, when 10.04 boots up, it kills mouse for the entire KVM unit until the KVM is power cycled.
Work around is to plug the 10.04 box to a mouse directly
